author: faridz
msg: * 22.locale.stdcxx-554.cpp: Added a regression test for STDCXX-554.

author: faridz
msg: * _messages.h (messages): Removed explicit invoking of the messages_base() ctor
to avoid buffer overrun due to bad code generation on MSVC 7.1.
* _moneypunct.h (moneypunct): Removed explicit invoking of the money_base() ctor
to avoid buffer overrun due to bad code generation on MSVC 7.1.
